attributes.review: I came to download this app because I wanted to someone convert myself to religion of trump like how some people are already doing, but I came to be utterly disappointed. Instead, I still hold my opinion that this man is not here for the people and is just a old, moldy, Cheeto 🤬✨. Chillleee, anyway arrest breyonna Taylor’s murders por favor 🤩✌🏾
attributes.title: Totally unacceptable ✨

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and my phone started to glitch out a lot. It kept opening and closing other apps and instantly shut down my phone for no reason. The coding needs work and we should STOP RACISM 2020 and remove this app from the App Store (:
attributes.title: slow and glitchy

attributes.review: I got this app in an attempt to find reasons why anyone would vote for trump, and let’s just say I came back empty handed. The president literally projects his terrible actions onto others, is a hypocritical , racist, and xenophobic liar. To say I’m disappointed would be the the most sugar coated way of putting it.
attributes.title: This app was terrible!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app only having to wait 5 hours for this to download!! When it was done downloading it gave my phone a virus where it almost deleted all my data but thank god I took care of it before it did. I don’t recommend this whoever reads this don’t ever download this app ever!!😡
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!🤮

attributes.review: You can not use the app unless you give them a verified cell phone number. Why should I subject myself to robo calls when I have no idea what the app is about. I should be able to examine the content of the app without being subject to robo calls.
attributes.title: Phone

attributes.review: Hi it’s your latina girly here to say that this app it’s trash ✨😳🔫. When I first downloaded this app I started getting weird side effects. I had dreams that I was turning into a fat old man with orange Oompa Lupa like skin, NOT OK 😔. I also started floating and shaking, screaming, “TRUMP THE CHEESE OVEN”. With a can of beans in hand. But that’s not really important. Well got to go chicas 🇲🇽👏⭐️.
attributes.title: I don’t really like Cheetos 😔✨👏🌟

attributes.review: this is the worst app i have ever downloaded. i wanted to find a reason to put faith back into my president and keep track of current events but all i found was propaganda, racism and even more disgusting virtues. if i could give the app less than one star i would.
attributes.title: AWFUL

attributes.review: I thought this was build a wall simulator 3000 but it had none of the features that I wanted, such as getting a gawk gawk double twister. I thought this app was suppose to make America GREAT again but that’s hardly possible with a guy like cheeky Trump. Ah well maybe Chìnæ has a better app than this 🤔
attributes.title: Expectations weren’t met

attributes.review: I am a Christian mother of 5, we live a modest and Christian Jesus life, I wanted to get this app on my electronic device in order to support our JESUS AND LORD DONALD TRUMP (amen) but when I opened the app THE COMMUNIST LIBTARD LIBERAL ANTIFA LEFTIES hacked my phone because the app did some COLORFUL rectangles and I PRAYED TO JESUS CHRIST but the DEVIL EVIL ANTI-GOD PRO-ABORTION COMMUNISM STALIN SOCIALIST BERNIE SANDER CNN SUPPORTERS didn’t go away. I do not reccomend. Will not tolerate anti-god and pro-abortion murderers in my Christian pro-god Jesus household, amen
attributes.title: bad app

attributes.review: This app made my phone turn on and off this is such a bad app when I saw the same my phone turned off but this app is so BAD it made my phone glitch and made my phone turn on and off so👹oh this app give it a 1 star don’t download it’s bad make ur phone have damages so I do t recommend it🙈🍊🍊🍊🍊
